doc.title: Illusion
doc.plot: The ultimate illusion! Filmmaker Rick McKay documents actor/illusionist James Beaman's transformation from an attractive young actor to the legendary icon Marlene Dietrich. McKay's camera follows him from his detailed make-up at home, into a waiting yellow cab and down to a Chelsea nightclub dressing room for finishing dressing and wig before he goes on to win over a standing room only audience.
